name: Simple Pricing Tables For WPBakery Page Builder(Formerly Visual Composer)
author: Labib Ahmed

sections.description:
Simple Pricing Tables is a WPBakery Page Builder Addon that will allow user to create pricing listing in a quick and easy way with style.It contains predefined color schemes which make it easy for you to set your pricing listing according to you need.It will give you full control over every element to customize it.

See DEMO Here

Features

  • 100% Responsive
  • Custom Column Layouts
  • Predefined Colour Schemes
  • Fully Customizeable
  • Extenal Linking on Buttons
  • Animation Effects
  • Unlimited Icons
  • Customizable Options
  • Animated
  • 24/7 Support
sections.installation:
1. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select ‘add new’
  2. Search for ‘Simple Pricing Tables For WPBakery Page Builder(Formerly Visual Composer)’ and install it
  3. Open For WPBakery Page Builder(Formerly Visual Composer)
  4. You can find Simple Pricing Table addon in “Content” tab of For WPBakery Page Builder

short_description: Simplest way to add pricing tables to your site with ease and beauty.
